body:
Site Engineer Tasks

The main tasks for the Site Engineer are to check the materials and issue any request in case materials are needed for the project.


Creating a Material Request

The Site Engineer can request any materials by using the link provided here. Click here

OR

The Site Engineer can follow the below directions to reach there.


How to Make a Material Request

Follow the below steps to issue Material Request.

  1. Select the Purpose, Required Date and Company.
  2. Next Enter the Project and the Block.
  3. Next Select the Items/Materials that are needed and the Quantity required.
  4. Then Click on Submit/Issue Request for Generating a Material Request.


The Request copy will be shared with the Site Engineer and a copy will be sent to the Project Manager.

body:
Indent Approver Tasks

To check and verify the Indents and to Approve/Reject them.

Upon logging in, the following screen will open.


Approve/Reject

First Access the Indent Approver Dashboard by clicking here or by clicking the Indent Approver Dashboard on the screen as follows.


The dashboard opens up


  1. The dashboard shows the count of Unapproved Indents. Clicking on these will open a list of Pending Indents either to be Approved or Rejected.
  2. Select the Indents to Approve. Check the entries and Approve/Reject.
  3. Reason of Rejection can be provided.
